tool.name: ampvis2 subset data

configfiles.configfile: library(ampvis2, quietly = TRUE) data <- readRDS("$data") #set tax_vector = 'c("' + '", "'.join(str($tax_vector).split(",")) + '")' data <- amp_subset_taxa( data, tax_vector = $tax_vector, normalise = $normalise, remove = $remove ) saveRDS(data, "$ampvis") @SAVE_TAX_LIST@

param.label: Remove
param.help: Selected taxa will be removed instead of being the only ones kept in the data.
